title: Tigerheart
description: Until 2013, Ri Mi-young was one of North Korea’s great cultural weapons. Her beauty and singing ability even rivaled South Korean pop stars. That is, until she vanished, and her fate became an official secret.When more high-profile North Koreans disappear, Pyongyang demands answers. Whoever is responsible will face a firing squad. But all isn’t as it seems—and the true story might spark a war.Called "stylish" and "expertly-written," Tigerheart follows the style of a Korean drama and is sure to appeal to Hallyu fans.
author: Hanneli
